user.title: Ajax Systems Setup
user.description: Choose the integration method for your Ajax alarm system.

data_description.integration_type:
SIA: Receive events via SIA DC-09 protocol (recommended)
Cloud: Full control via Ajax API (experimental)
MQTT: Use Jeedom bridge as fallback

sia.title: SIA Protocol Configuration
sia.description: Configure the SIA DC-09 receiver. Set up your Ajax Hub to send events to this Home Assistant instance.

data_description.sia_port: Port to listen for SIA events (default: 2410)
data_description.sia_account: Account code configured in your Ajax Hub
data_description.sia_encryption_key: AES encryption key if encryption is enabled

cloud.title: ⚠️ Ajax Cloud API - NOT WORKING
cloud.description: WARNING: The Ajax Cloud API was CLOSED by Ajax Systems in 2018 and no longer works for home users. The Enterprise API is only available to commercial partners. Please use SIA Protocol instead for a working integration.

data_description.try_anyway: Attempt connection even though it's not expected to work
data_description.use_sia: Enable SIA receiver for faster event updates (recommended)
data_description.sia_port: Port to listen for SIA events
data_description.sia_account: Account code configured in your Ajax Hub

mqtt.title: MQTT Bridge Configuration
mqtt.description: Configure MQTT bridge using Jeedom. Requires Jeedom with Ajax plugin to be running.

data_description.mqtt_prefix: MQTT topic prefix used by Jeedom
data_description.use_sia: Enable SIA receiver for direct hub events
data_description.sia_port: Port to listen for SIA events

jeedom.title: Jeedom Cloud Proxy Configuration
jeedom.description: Use the Jeedom Market cloud as a proxy to control your Ajax system. This provides FULL CONTROL including arm/disarm. Requires a Jeedom Market account.

data_description.use_sia: Enable SIA for faster real-time events
data_description.sia_port: Port to listen for SIA events
data_description.sia_account: Account code configured in your Ajax Hub

error.cloud_api_closed: The Ajax Cloud API was closed in 2018 and no longer works. Please use SIA Protocol instead.
error.invalid_auth: Invalid username or password. Check your Ajax app credentials.
error.invalid_jeedom_auth: Invalid Jeedom Market credentials. Check your market.jeedom.com login.
error.no_hubs: No Ajax hubs found. Check your Ajax app credentials.
error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect. Check your internet connection.
error.unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Check the logs for details.

abort.already_configured: This Ajax system is already configured.
